config.trailmix.prop.potFireballUse.desc: Time from effect used when firing a fireball (in ticks)
config.trailmix.prop.potFireballMinReq.d: Minimum Trail Mix effect time required to launch fireballs (in ticks)
config.trailmix.prop.potDuration.desc: Duration of each trail mix eaten (in ticks)
config.trailmix.prop.potPoisoning.desc:
How much can you take before overdosing (in ticks)
Set to 0 to disable
config.trailmix.prop.launcherSuckRange.d: The range (in blocks) that the launcher can suck pigs.
config.trailmix.prop.knockbackMultiplier: The multiplier for the knockback when you punch an entity
config.trailmix.prop.pigExplosion.desc:
Do pig explosions damage blocks?
0 = No
1 = Yes
2 = World Game Rules
config.trailmix.prop.horseClearZone.desc:
Do horses clear the area while running on trail mix?
0 = No
1 = Yes
2 = World Game Rules
config.trailmix.prop.horseFireTrail.desc: Do horses leave a trail of fire while running on trail mix?
config.trailmix.prop.explosionBubble.des: Enable the explosion bubble effects when hitting mobs?
config.trailmix.prop.showFlightTimer.des: Show the time remaining on flight?
config.trailmix.prop.replaceRender.desc:
Replace pig render with custom render?
If you have issues with invisible pigs etc, disable this.
config.trailmix.prop.pitchUpKey.desc: Key to pitch upwards while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.pitchDownKey.desc: Key to pitch downwards while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.strafeLeftKey.desc: Key to turn left while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.strafeRightKey.desc: Key to turn right while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.speedUpKey.desc: Key to speed up while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.speedDownKey.desc: Key to slow down while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.tightTurnKey.desc: Key to make tight turns while on a trail mix pig
config.trailmix.prop.invertPitch.desc: Do you want to invert the pitch controls?
